captionText: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

captionText: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
author: Bill Gates

captionText: Technology is anything that wasn’t around when you were born.
author: Alan Kay

captionText: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
author: Edward Teller

captionText: The most important thing is to be able to think for yourself.
author: Steve Wozniak

captionText: The great myth of our times is that technology is communication.
author: Libby Larsen

captionText: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
author: Sydney J. Harris

captionText: Technology is best when it brings people together.
author: Matt Mullenweg
